content.description: Climb up the slab from the gully clipping bolts as you go. A mild crux about halfway up will keep you on your toes.
content.location: This is the second from left route in the Cool Aid Gully accessed from the SW side of Moon Rock. Easily visible from the parking/camping area.

content.description: A super fun sport route on the typical gritty flakes of Moon Rock. This route has a huge number of pieces that look like they're going to come off but don't. Three distinct steps to overcome with thin edging. Great sequences.
content.protection: This is the second from left route in the Cool Aid Gully accessed from the SW side of Moon Rock. Shares a chain anchor with Barbarian Horde.

content.description: Wander up the slab from the bottom of the gully. The route steepens in the middle requiring some more creative footwork.
content.protection: Quickdraws to a two bolt anchor at the top. The anchors have no chains so you'll need to traverse left to the anchors for Hey Cool Aid.
content.location: This is the third from left route in the Cool Aid Gully accessed from the SW side of Moon Rock.

content.description:
Located in between Maximus and Delirious is another quality sport line. Like most of the routes the crux comes dead in the middle with an abrupt steep section overcome with fun, sequential footwork.

This route isn't in the James Garrett's excellent West Desert guidebook so if anyone knows additional information about it I'd love to add that in. The grade is a guess on my part.
content.protection: This is the fourth from left route in the Cool Aid Gully accessed from the SW side of Moon Rock. Has large chain anchors at the top.

content.description: Start by slabbing up from the gully and then stemming into the corner. Find the solid holds and work your way up until the right side sloughs off and you're forced up and out the water chute to the top.
content.protection: Quickdraws to a shared chain anchor with Maximus.
content.location: This is the far right route in the Cool Aid Gully accessed from the SW side of Moon Rock.
